ISR.tip: Tipping 10-15% is customary in restaurants. Round up taxi fares.

THA.tip: Tipping is not traditional but appreciated in tourist areas. 10% for good service.

JPN.tip: Tipping is not customary and can be considered rude. Excellent service is standard.

FRA.tip: Service charge is usually included. Round up or leave 5-10% for exceptional service.

DEU.tip: Round up the bill or leave 5-10% for good service. Tipping is expected but not obligatory.

ITA.tip: Service charge may be included. Leave 5-10% extra for good service.

ESP.tip: Leave small change or 5-10% for good service. Tipping is more common in tourist areas.

GBR.tip: 10-15% is standard if service charge not included. Round up in pubs.

USA.tip: 15-20% is expected in restaurants. Tip bartenders, servers, and hotel staff.

MEX.tip: 10-15% is standard in restaurants. Round up for small services.

BRA.tip: 10% is standard for restaurant service. Round up for casual services.

ARG.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in restaurants. Tipping is not expected in cafes.

CHL.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Not expected for small purchases.

PER.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in tourist restaurants. Round up for casual service.

COL.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Round up for small services.

CAN.tip: 15-20% is standard in restaurants. Tip servers, bartenders, and delivery staff.

AUS.tip: Tipping is not traditional but appreciated for exceptional service. 10% maximum.

NZL.tip: Tipping is optional. Round up for excellent service, especially in tourist areas.

IND.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in upscale restaurants. Not expected in local eateries.

VNM.tip: Tipping is not traditional but appreciated in tourist areas. Round up for good service.

SGP.tip: Service charge is usually included. Tipping is not customary but appreciated.

MYS.tip: Tipping is not customary. Round up for exceptional service in tourist areas.

IDN.tip: Tipping is not traditional but appreciated in tourist establishments. Round up small amounts.

PHL.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

KOR.tip: Tipping is not customary and can be refused. Excellent service is standard.

CHN.tip: Tipping is not traditional. Round up for exceptional service in high-end establishments.

TUR.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Round up for small services like taxis.

EGY.tip: Tipping (baksheesh) is expected for most services. 10-15% in restaurants.

MAR.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in restaurants. Round up for guides and small services.

ZAF.tip: 10-15% is standard in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

NLD.tip: Round up the bill or leave 5-10% for good service. Tipping is appreciated but not obligatory.

CHE.tip: Service is usually included. Round up for exceptional service.

BEL.tip: Round up or leave 5-10% for good service. Service charge may be included.

AUT.tip: Round up the bill or leave 5-10% for good service. Tipping is customary.

SWE.tip: Service is usually included. Round up for exceptional service.

NOR.tip: Service charge is usually included. Tipping is not expected but appreciated.

DNK.tip: Service charge is usually included. Round up for exceptional service.

FIN.tip: Service charge is usually included. Tipping is not customary.

POL.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

CZE.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Round up for small services.

HUN.tip: 10% tip is expected in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

GRC.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

RUS.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in restaurants. Round up for small services.

PRT.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

IRN.tip: Tipping is not traditional but appreciated in tourist areas. Round up for good service.

ARE.tip: Tipping is expected in restaurants and hotels. 10-15% is standard.

SAU.tip: Tipping is appreciated but not obligatory. 10% in restaurants is common.

JOR.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

LBN.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Round up for small services.

NGA.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

KEN.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in tourist restaurants. Round up for guides and casual services.

TUN.tip: 10% tip is standard in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

DZA.tip: 10% tip is appreciated in restaurants. Round up for casual services.

defaultBudget.tip: Tipping customs vary. 10% is generally safe for restaurants if service charge not included.
